itunes:title: #62: Therapy vs Coaching When Healing From Love Addiction
title: #62: Therapy vs Coaching When Healing From Love Addiction
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: If you are wanting to do coaching while you do therapy or vice versa to heal from love addiction, this episode is for you.  Shena breaks down the different responsibilities and roles of your therapist versus your coach when healing from your...
itunes:summary:
If you are wanting to do coaching while you do therapy or vice versa to heal from love addiction, this episode is for you. 

Shena breaks down the different responsibilities and roles of your therapist versus your coach when healing from your intimacy disorder.
